titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the visit of the Prime Minister of New Zealand, the Right Honorable James Bolger.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

bill.summary: 3/28/1995--Introduced. Welcomes Prime Minister James Bolger of New Zealand to the United States. Welcomes bilateral trade between New Zealand and the United States, which exceeded U.S. $2 billion in 1994, and commends New Zealand for its dedication to reducing agricultural protectionism and liberalizing world trade.
